scripts.start: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && (cd ../backend && npm run seed 2>/dev/null || cd ../backend && npm run seed:dev 2>/dev/null || echo 'Running without seed...') && cd .. && npx npm-run-all --parallel "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: npx npm-run-all --parallel "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.seed: cd backend && (npm run seed 2>/dev/null || npm run seed:dev 2>/dev/null || echo 'No seed script found')
